topic: Tools for generating novel insights in AI and energy industries
content: Generated from lens processing: My working hypothesis is that shuffling prompts can reveal unexpected connections and insights that challenge existing thought patterns. As a next step, I will create a systematic process for shuffling my prompts—perhaps using a randomizer tool—to regularly generate new question combinations, allowing me to explore these insights further. This will be complemented by documenting any recurring themes or novel perspectives that arise from this exercise.

metadata.trigger: If I shuffled my own prompts, what new ones emerge?
